channel.title: Euthymia - Diseaseful
channel.description:
Well I've been working with this base, and well it has some stuff, so i decided to take this project, i'm aiming this to be a good project, what do i mean? I do plan on hosting this and getting lots of players if possible, but that is close because i have been getting some support from my parents.
The server will have little fun things like quests, obv the green dragons and such. The skills aren't all working but i'm aiming to complete all of them if possible or most. I'm the only developer for now, and probably won't have developers.
I'm aiming to do a fun server, Something like fagex did back be4 08 but not a remake since it has customs quests, and "Small fun things" like Interactive objects and npcs.
Wanna learn more? visit the forums by clicking the link above.
[url=http://euthymia.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum]Click here to be redirected to forums.[/url]
So I've started developing Euthymia and got some stuff so far
Quests: * Animal i have become -This quest is about a woman having problems on controling her self -Quest rewards = Heal&Energy Whenever you're with her. * Teacher in hurry -A teacher has lost his book, what will he do now? -You'll have to make a new one for him. -20 Thieving is required. -Quest Rewards = half of his pay and xp.
Pathfinding: * Following -No walking through objects while following * Combat Following -No walking through object while following [img]http://s12.postimg.org/ssb36iqyl/euthymia1_1.png[/img] [img]http://s12.postimg.org/cvcb9sykd/euthymia1_2.png[/img] Skills: *Thieving -Fixed xp rates and rewards for mans. [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/580/crop/0,0,580x381/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%205.png[/img] Shops: *General Stores -Started basic stores. [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/518/crop/0,0,518x343/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%208.png[/img] *Misc -Added Day night/system -Ghosts spawn in draynor manor at night (in home) [img]http://s12.postimg.org/ecxrld3b1/euthymia1_4.png[/img] -emotions work. [img]http://s12.postimg.org/r31zygb99/euthymia1_3.png[/img] Animal i have become quest [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/6rpnc3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/8x3igz.jpg[/img] Home [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/16jr0pd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/e7e6x2.jpg[/img] Thieving [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/580/crop/0,0,580x382/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%209.png[/img]
Quest points: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mflwsw.jpg[/img]
I'll add more media and content later. I'm still uploading pictures.
Website developer needed.
Expect alpha tomorrow.
Have any questions on why i picked name? Ask.

item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:37, topic:511925”]what is the server day time era versus the night time era time? (is it gmt etc? )

Does it run fro an actual 16 hours of day compared to six hours of night time or what?

Overall though, looks pretty amazing. It would be cool if you integrated that idea to all of the global map though instead of just Draynor.[/quote]Yeah, i, well we (JavaLearner joined me) Want to use the whole world, or most of it, but you know its sooo big, so we start from something.

About the day night system… Is not too good but… oh well… For the beta stage i think it’ll be 4 hours day and half hour night, or something like that…

Read full topic

dev log [code] April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Fixed announcements when the Day or night changes. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Started on adding drops. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Added armour shop at home April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Started working on the handler for the next quest. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: added quest points April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: fixed pathfinding, wouldn't work with npcs April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Domain parked on forums April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Started to fix Xp rates, not sure on what should be. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Added poll on moparscape. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Added more pics yay April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Picked a forum moderator. April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Clipped firemaking, Wont walk if the zone next to the player is unwalkable April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Took a pee April 1st - Strucker/Mr boogie: Refactored the package a bit April 1st - Lare96: Well he's really helped with alot of things so i though i would mention him here. April 5th - Strucker/Mr boogie: Fixed wildy level bug. April 5th - Strucker/Mr boogie: Added over 80 npc's April 5th - Strucker/Mr boogie: Added green dragons fire. April 5th - Strucker/Mr boogie: Found a client. [/code]

Guys join foorums
http://www.euthymias.net/index.php?action=forum

item.title: Euthymia - Diseaseful
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:23, topic:511925”]make sure you send messages such as ‘the sun has peaked in Euthymia’ etc globally, because if people are doing certain action(s) (walking) for instance, the statement won’t show; unless you disable certain packets before it’s sent, then enable them after again. this is just so people know what the f*ck is going on.

good luck[/quote]
Thanks for the luck, and yeah that’s what i had noticed if im doing something the interface wont show so im guessing i’ll change it to a Message in the chatbox l0l.

Guys join the forumss

Read full topic

item.title: Euthymia - Diseaseful
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:15, topic:511925”]Just make an enum to define the state the server is in

public enum State { MORNING, AFTERNOON, EVENING, NIGHT }

Then a static variable to hold the current server state

Then create a task that periodically executes that will change the state.

[code=java]…

@Override
public void run() {
if(Server.serverState == State.MORNING) {
Server.serverState = State.AFTERNOON;
}
… // other shit here

 ...
 // loop through all players and change the screen based on the current state

}

…
[/code]

Thats pretty much how I did it. You could also save the state to a .txt file then read it on startup to save the state during updates (ps: that’s also how I made the number of days passed system!).

If you don’t set a global (static) time throughout the server every player will have a different time… lol[/quote]

You should do it based on time so it would effect players in a different time zones.

Read full topic
